arts.ttl: Heidenheim's relegation play-off spot confirmed following heavy Werder Bremen defeat
arts.sum: Heidenheim will contest the relegation play-off against the team that finishes third in Bundesliga 2 for the right to play in next season's top tier following a heavy loss to Werder Bremen on the final day of 2024/25. Stage's header dented Heidenheim's confidence before the break, doubling their lead in a half where the hosts struggled to create.

arts.ttl: FC Heidenheim sent to the relegation-playoff following loss to Werder Bremen
arts.sum: The first leg of the relegation-playoff will take place on Thursday night.

arts.ttl: FC Heidenheim vs Werder Bremen preview: Final day drama unlikely
arts.sum: While this might be one of the most uneventful matches of the day, there’s a chance it’ll have massive implications on the final standings.
